item.title: RSA-CRT
item.author: Author
item.description: RSA with CRT $$ M = C^d \ (\bmod \ n) $$ 對 $C$ 解密的過程，可以透過 CRT 加速 假設兩個未知數 $m_1 , m_2$ 如下 $m_1 = M \ (\bmod \ p) \hspace{1em} = \lbrack C^d \ (\bmod \ n) \rbrack \ (\bmod \ p) = C^d \ (\bmod \ p)$ $m_2 = M \ (\bmod \ q) \hspace{1em} = \lbrack C^d \ (\bmod \ n) \rbrack \ (\bmod \ q) = C^d \ (\bmod \ q)$

item.title: Chinese Remainder Theorem
item.author: Author
item.description: Chinese Remainder Theorem $$ \begin{cases} x \equiv a_{1} \ ( \bmod \ m_{1} ) \\ x \equiv a_{2} \ ( \bmod \ m_{2} ) \\ \hspace{3.5em} \vdots \\ x \equiv a_{n} \ ( \bmod \ m_{n} ) \end{cases} $$ 已知合數 $M = m_{1} \times m_{2} \times \cdots \times m_{n}$ $m_{1},m_{2}, \cdots ,m_{n}$ 為彼此互質的整數 ( $m_{i}$ 可為質數的 $k$ 次方，如 $m_{1} = 5^{3}$ ) 我們可以透過 $a_{1},a_{2}, \cdots ,a_{n}$ 以及 $m_{1},m_{2}, \cdots ,m_{n}$ 計算出 $A$
